name: Feline Escape 2
description:
Runner game with the theme of "never stop moving" from Game Jam Theme Generator. Continuation of Feline Escape.

Controls:

Use A and D to move left and right respectively (also used to turn corners once you enter the corner tile), SPACE to jump, S to force the player downward after a jump, SHIFT to slide, and E to pause the game.

Requirements:

Game 5 Requirements List
